title: How to speak to yourself in terms of victory rather than defeat - Quora

response.answer_text: What your thoughts are, such is your life. you can control your thoughts, that isn’t something impossible. Affirmation sentences are good like a morning routine. Many have good experiences. Some suggest that we need to make 3 positive thoughts for 1 negative. That is also a good tactic. If you need some help contact me.

The simpler answer is to get yourself into the habit of seeing things in a positive light. It’s often not easy but once that habit has been established in your psyche, your whole reality will take on a far brighter appearance. Energy, be it positive or negative cannot be destroyed. It is possible however to transmute the negative energy into positive. For example, instead of experiencing something negative and thinking ‘why is this happening to me’ or is do or don’t deserve this’, see the experience as a test and think ‘what is there to learn from this?’ It all begins with self love. Love yourself and it becomes far easier to approach everything else from a place of love. You’ll be surprised at how different everything turns out.
